doc:
Bernie Kopell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bernie_Kopell 0 Bernard Morton Kopell (born June 21, 1933) is an American character actor known for his roles as Siegfried in Get Smart from 1966 to 1969 and as Dr. Adam Bricker ("Doc") in ABC's The Love Boat from 1977 to 1986. Bernard_Morton_Kopell ( born June_21_,_1933 ) is an_American_character_actor known for his_roles as Siegfried in Get_Smart from 1966 to 1969 and as Dr._Adam_Bricker ( "_Doc_" ) in ABC 's_The_Love_Boat from 1977 to 1986 .
